25 stars rounding 2 missing foodmy favorite world probably japanese loveeeeee japanese tapas sushi however quite disappointment price paid dont think worth restaurant tiny recommend make reservations seated awkwardly two table right close like eating meal togetherorderedx shime saba torched mackerel sashimi server recommended said little fishy lovee mackerel used eat often expecting like super disappointed put slight fishiness x salmon kama prefer hamachi kama salmon told special ordered overcooked tasted like salmon filet x seabass tataki first bites fish mildly fishy dont think use fresh fish x clams steamed clams w butter goodx jumbo squid grilled whole squid w teriyaki sauce probably favorite night slightly underwood made weird texture chewy like supposed bex yuba spoons uni ikura thoroughly enjoyed super downsidex mini kaisen danbury salmon ikura sea urchin snow crab rice ordered earlier emergency leave later realized never got server take check mention us take togo considering 15 happyfor 150 price tag worth ingredients taste fresh flavors blow minds ok  honestly wouldnt eat ippuku better imo pictures look wayyy better tastes

came kiraku around 830 hoping seated around 900 thought reasonable yeah literally frustrated ever waiting eat restaurant front restaurant theres waitlist actually write name 630 come back 900 priority everyone else waiting enough people point party ended waiting hour eat honestly say first time ever felt hopeless waiting eat somewhere lol must looked real sad asking lady seating parties much longer wed wait seated us right away spoke heres ordered night housemade tofu 45 personally dont like tofu way layered flavors seasonings bonito tasty tofu soft delicious simple slight bias cause im huge tofu fansuzuki carpaccio 455 hand love raw fish tasty flavors made great bite umami favorites night con found salty otherwise tasty freshgrilled squid 55 favorite night grilled squid rubbery super easy squid softer bite sauce brush squid lemon mayo aioli sauce comes great enjoyed lotcorn tempura 455 much hype deserved tasty saw yelp thought might much batter little fritters actually done another simple prepared roasted duck 255 may personal preference left weird taste mouth everyone else said tasted like meat lol organic chicken karaage 35 eh liked crispy chicken juicy needed crunch outside oily humble opinionsweet yuzu sake 55 loooved sake tasted yummy wasnt strong part tasted like juice wasnt even mad though super besides point found average didnt blow away maybe yelp hyped ahah definitely nice spot wait hour eat nah

455ive attempted come times usually hunger beats desire try since honestly thought overrated nope definitely wait tocame friend saturday friend couldnt eat 8pm hovered around board trying around 745pm put name 630pm called around 40 minutes later early us told dont respond tell youre back theyll give next seatservice nice attentive came great pacefor meal got following1 yuba 12 tofus soy taste strong paired uni ikura already great combo entire bite silky sweet pops texture saltiness ikura bit pricy worth trying dont like tofu skip though 4552 corn tempura 5 item recommend skipping im sure everyone recommends matcha salt nice element matcha wasnt quite strong enough make interesting tempura texture close enough corns natural texture doesnt much terms flavor tastes like corn 253 foie gras 24 paying 24 2 oz anything bit crazy proper foie gras totally worth foie gras slight skin otherwise clean fatty delicious sauce flavorful tied toasted rice flavor 554 suzuki carpaccio 12 friend insisted didnt like sea bass changed mind trying fish thin yuzu flavor strong think made perfect combo since sea bass bit light flavor isnt sour tart citrus flavors star 4555 ankimo 10 trying eel liver ran ankimo instead ankimo million times didnt know different ankimo light texturally like nothing tongue somehow buttery 556 pork belly skewer 4 need cooked meat night give option wasnt extremely standout exactly expect pork belly skewer taste 357 deluxe chazuke 10  it warm light packed flavor broth addons terrific way end meal 55overall kiraku blew away thought 45 stars rating hype definitely holds cant wait go back

looking familystyle izakaya type places could miss kiraku least 30 minutes spare even bother wait front wait time easily exceed expectationonce got seated lengthy wait found every minute wait worthwhile uni spoons ikura top freshly delicious beef tongue skewers marinated jumbo squid help mayonnaise impressive even let us downreally tiny space might feel bit crowded first yet bare compensate everything

friend recently got new job much better suited last decided celebrate kiraku heard kiraku despite attended college knew come early showed 1530 minutes opening 4th person waiting list seated quickly ordered within 10 minutes surprisingly waited served friend actually point getting hangry people come later us ordered us getting waiting might staff made ton beef tongue serve first multiple periods time physically flag wait staff service either order items order alcohol orderedjumbo squid excellentfoie gras poele insert emoji heart eyes seared foie gras rice rich umami sauce tbh rice star although foie gras rich yummy pricey especially youre celebrating something corn fritters little pricey although expected fun item provides nice crunch although wouldve nice come dressing sort dont believe premium beef tongue ahhhhhhh favorite juicy savory tender soooo totally feeding beef tongue obsession years ago could imagined saying ordered carafe cheapest sake dont know sake enjoyed came beautiful carafe separate ice compartment icechilling seriously want wait staff comes offering small sake cups friend want bring home haha overall tldr excellent drink although improvements made wait staff pay attention people delivering items 45

kiraku definitely favorite restaurants im surprised seeing long lines best wait times encountered beginning dinner open 530pm usually come 5pm wait 30 minute wait much better 1 hour waits restaurant small cramped seems like big groups might difficult menu expansive favorites ones hadyuba spoon full delicious seafood uni fish eggs tastes like ocean youre thatcorn tempura super crispy slightly sweet corn goes salt im sure taste green tea salt delicious nonetheless surprisingly light friedness cartilage texture might agreeable everyone delicious lemon little crunchy inside recommend youre feeling adventurousnasu miso delicious especially eggplant lovers eggplant soft contrasts nicely miso glaze itroasted duck meat tender soft though might partial since love duckjumbo squid surprisingly soft lot chewystringy squid favorite parts definitely slightly crispy legs top part headsweet potato brulee texture isnt quite creme brulee little thicker tastes like sweet potato crispy sugar delicious ityuzu mochi might partial love yuzu citrus fruit light refreshing dessert foodtheres many dishes want try cant wait come back try delicious small japanese tapas great share maybe 1 person eat

kiraku definitely gives authentic japanese restaurant vibe small restaurant prepared wait make reservations came group 5 put name around 630pm sunday evening seated 745pm bit later everything delicious flavorful basically small dishes kept ordering able try multiple small dishes chicken cartilage definitely interesting like mentioned earlier came group 5 feel like restaurant better small groups group 2 3 likely come back date

cute little pleasant surprise dont venture often im glad started exploring outside city kiraku worth wait came dinner saturday night wait 30 min party two around 9pm tried call prior make reservations ever picked phone entered restaurant though made sense four waitresses total scurrying around small little restaurant seats 35 people max menu straight forward daily specials chef special sashimi eat fish freshest tasted delicious octopus okra tasty fresh scallops buttercan without next time mini donburiok without chef special sashimi must getstrawberry nigorifave waygu beef tatakiim fan striped bass carpacciopretty overall ill back great friendly service reasonable prices tapas

fairly small restaurant thats always busy always worth wait weve actually started making reservations know want eat dont wait long delicious must haves everytime spicy jellyfish uni spoon fried corn truffle beef tongue green tea ice cream order whatever else feeling like eating day usually specials thats cool comes fast order service isnt bad busy restaurant probably small im complaining never go wrong love kiraku
